title: PSA: You can set Ruqqus to block offensive content and slurs in your user settings

author.bio_html: Join me in +NFL and +CFB

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body:

I'd like to block phrases like "True communism has never been tried" and "systemic racism".

author.bio_html:
Howdy! 🌻🐤 ~retrofire.ink~ 🎨🔥

limited [only] by your skill and imagination

body:
Uhhhh, ya.

Extremely so... Have you seen what this kind of system has done to Twitter? People just block out all the keywords that upset them. It destroys open debate. Like I don't want to hear the words "Conservative" or "2 genders" anymore so I'm going to just filter out those people entirely.

The setting integrated into the website seems more like an attempt to appease internet denizens than something auspicious to the website's core.
body_html:
Uhhhh, ya.

The setting integrated into the website seems more like an attempt to appease internet denizens than something auspicious to the website's core.
